name: BusinessAI Assistant
description: An AI-powered virtual assistant that helps small businesses automate administrative tasks, manage schedules, and respond to basic customer inquiries.

name: SalesGenius
description: An AI-powered CRM enhancement that helps sales teams identify high-potential leads, recommend optimal follow-up times, and predict deal outcomes.

name: FinancePredict
description: An AI financial analysis tool that provides small businesses with cash flow forecasting, expense tracking, and financial planning assistance.
